docs.lead_paragraph: Canada will not tighten its border to deter migrants crossing illegally from the United States in the wake of a U.S. immigration crackdown because the numbers are not big enough to cause alarm, a government minister said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Canada: No Plans to Clamp Down at Border to Deter Migrants
headline.main: Canada: No Plans to Clamp Down at Border to Deter Migrants

docs.snippet: Canada will not tighten its border to deter migrants crossing illegally from the United States in the wake of a U.S. immigration crackdown because the numbers are not big enough to cause alarm, a government minister said on Saturday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox ace David Price says it's still too early to tell when his ailing left elbow and forearm will heal enough for him to pitch in a game.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Ace Price Says Too Early to Tell When He'll Pitch
headline.main: Red Sox Ace Price Says Too Early to Tell When He'll Pitch

docs.lead_paragraph: About 1,000 people have turned out to honor a 14-year-old boy who was found drowned in the Los Angeles River after a storm.

docs.lead_paragraph: Staffan de Mistura, the top United Nations diplomat working to resolve the civil war in Syria, which is about to enter its seventh year, reported some progress on Friday after nearly 10 days of talks in Geneva.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and REUTERS

docs.snippet: Staffan de Mistura, the top United Nations diplomat working to resolve the civil war in Syria, which is about to enter its seventh year, reported some progress on Friday after nearly 10 days of talks in Geneva....

docs.lead_paragraph: An explosion has killed four people at a home in a Mexico City suburb where a massive fireworks market blast left dozens dead in December.

docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma lawmaker who once likened Islam to cancer required Muslims to answer several written questions — including, "Do you beat your wife?" — before agreeing to meet with them.

docs.lead_paragraph: Six shelter dogs looking to be adopted are playing fetch at the Brazil Open in Sao Paulo, giving tennis fans a demonstration of their ball-retrieving skills.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican federal police rescued 31 Cuban immigrants who had been held in a house in the resort city of Cancun, the government said on Saturday.
